design_system.name: The Glass Laboratory
design_system.description: A sterile, high-precision environment for AI evaluation. Combines the clarity of Swiss design with the depth of modern glassmorphism.

glassmorphism.panel: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-sm

evaluation_panel.right_panel: w-full lg:w-1/3 h-full border-l border-border bg-muted/30 p-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle noise.
Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give a technical feel.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all AI prompts and responses.
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid'.
Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) to create a spacious feel.

setup: Configure Tailwind theme with the provided colors and radius.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar and header structure.

pages.login: Use the 'login_background' image as a subtle cover or side panel. Keep the form clean and centered.
pages.dashboard: Implement the 'Bento Grid Mode B'. Use cards for 'Recent Evaluations', 'Safety Score', and 'Hallucination Rate'.
pages.evaluation: Use the 'split_pane' layout. The left side displays the Prompt and AI Response (in Mono font). The right side contains the rating sliders and toggles.
